title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.172 - Lighting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.172 - Lighting

State Regulations

Permanent artificial light sources are to be installed and maintained to provide at least 30 foot-candles of light on all food preparation surfaces and at equipment or utensil washing work levels. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-4.172

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
